title: If champion quotes had to include the word "Donger" in them
body:
{{champion:64}} Your donger, my hands.

{{champion:1}} Have you seen my donger, Tibbers?

{{champion:111}} Beware the donger.

ヽ༼ຈل͜ ຈ༽ﾉ

replies.body: {{champion:254}} Donger first. Donger questions later.
{{champion:222}} You think I'm crazy? You should see my Donger.

To complete the triad:

{{champion:51}} Meet the long Donger of the law.
{{champion:222}} But where are your other dongers, hat lady?
imagine if i had a REAL DONGER..{{champion:24}}
{{champion:24}} Who wants a piece of the donger?
{{champion:33}} Donger.

{{champion:266}} This donger will be my masterpiece

Cut the dongers from them!

Donger with fear in your heart, or win with blood on your hands.

{{champion:103}} Should I make your donger rise? Or....STOP!

{{champion:61}} I have sharp dongers

Ok I'm done rofl

Ok one more

{{champion:102}} By the blood of my donger, I will end them!
{{champion:26}}  I've seen your donger, it was painful...
{{champion:238}} The unseen donger is the deadliest.
MY DONGER IS LIMITLESS {{champion:134}}

{{champion:45}} - "I will devour your Donger!"

{{champion:45}} - "Even now your Donger suffers!"

{{champion:45}} - "If the Dongers were turned, I would show you no mercy!"

{{champion:45}} - "You deny the Donger in your soul! You deny your power!"

{{champion:45}} - "It's a short Donger. Was that a short joke?!"
That last one, oh man. XD
"Caught between a rock... and a hard donger." {{champion:54}}

{{champion:117}} 

Let's use all the dongers.

Never look a donger in the eye.

Let's put on our thinking dongers.

That  donger looks familiar.
Lulu has now become 10x sluttier than necessary.

{{champion:117}} Yup
, that tasted donger!

{{champion:58}} White Donger, Dark Donger, It's all the same!
{{champion:75}} Renekton was lost, long ago. You are nothing but his pale donger.
{{champion:75}} The butcher, drowned in his own donger
{{champion:58}} Come back when you've donger'd all the bits of yourself!

{{champion:44}}  Dongers, Dongers are truly outrageous.
They are truly, truly, truly....... Outrageous
ahh man that cracked me up nice one

{{champion:111}} The endless donger.

{{champion:101}} Dongers are only distractions.

{{champion:101}} Your Donger beckons.

{{champion:101}} Donger? I'll show you real donger.

{{champion:101}} Behold my donger!
{{champion:119}} Welcome to the league of Dongers.
{{champion:72}} FEEL MY DONGER!
{{champion:72}} I miss my donger

{{champion:61}} 

This donger is very exciting.

The donger is impatient.

{{champion:22}} 

I only need one donger!

Donger guide me.

No one escapes my donger.

Donger requires a steady hand.


Faster than my donger? I think not.


Okay I'm done!

{{champion:22}} All the world, on one Donger.

{{champion:81}} I don't need a Donger.

{{champion:107}} Their Dongers will adorn my wall!

{{champion:38}} I tried to silence my Donger once... Boy did i regret that!

{{champion:40}} The Donger is at your command.

{{champion:36}} Come to Donger!

{{champion:37}} From my Donger to yours.

{{champion:8}} Trickling Dongers.

{{champion:8}} The Donger thickens.

{{champion:8}} You look like someone who's got a lot going on beneath the Donger.
LOL the vlad ones i cant stop laughing!

{{champion:22}}  Do you like my Donger? I was talking about the bow.
